explanation: [0-0] A wild boar appears on a country road, foraging for food on the roadside, with a black car parked nearby. Four horror emojis are displayed on the screen.

[0-4] Then the wild boar suddenly rushes to the middle of the road. A red circle encircles the boar, while a black car is approaching from a distance. The boar charges straight towards the car, breaking the headlights. The screen turns black, still showing the four horror emojis.
